TopicTitle: So I'm finally no longer homeless and plan to christen this occasion with a rocket launch. Where should I go?

Articles.Content:
Technically its been a few weeks but I've been getting settled and unfortunately the excitement of being able to play Bannerlord, which I missed out on originally due to worldly events, precluded my own interest in KSP. 

It even stopped me from writing the alternate history I've been plugging away at for months over at alternatehistory.com

 

But, now I'm in. Where should I go? 

I usually head for Mun but may be I should challenge myself for a change?

Go to Dres, It's a very lonely world, and you should give it the love it deserves.

Edited April 15, 2022 by siklidkid
Duna has nice scenery and is relatively easy to reach.
Gilly has quite a nice view of Eve. Plus its easy to land on

Out and return:

Easy: Mun / minmus

Bit harder: Gilly / Duna / Ike

Even a bit more challenging: Dres, the low gravity moons of Jool

Hard: Moho, Eve, Laythe, Tylo and Eloo.

Harder: a comet!

Go get them all!!

11 hours ago, Epicdreamer said:

Harder: a comet!

Comet intercepts are one of my favorites, and a bit of a challenge.

Seeing the coma and tail as you approach is really cool.
